subredditUsers.label: Match Users
subredditUsers.helpText: Enter users to match, separate users with a comma. (e.g. PlexversalHD, u/dev-insights, u/spez)

subredditFlairText.label: Match User Flair Text
subredditFlairText.helpText: Enter flair text to match, separate flair text with a comma. (e.g. Dev, Community manager, :YT: YouTuber, EA, Respawn)

subredditFlairCssclass.label: Match Flair CSS
subredditFlairCssclass.helpText: Enter flair text shown in subreddit flair settings, separate flair text with a comma. (e.g. dev, community-manager, ea, respawn)

subredditPostFlairText.label: Match Post Flair Text or ID
subredditPostFlairText.helpText: STRONGLY advise they are mod only post flairs, separate flair text with a comma. (e.g. Official News, Updates, 12ff3a4-66a7ff77-44f4f)

dependantFlairMatches.label: Post Flair matches depend on User?
dependantFlairMatches.helpText: Enable this if you only want to match posts based on post flair from users specified in the "Match Users" setting above. (comments are not affected)

separateTabPostFlair1.label: Separate Posts Tab for a specific post flair
separateTabPostFlair1.helpText: Format is: [Tab Button Name](exact flair text OR template ID). You can use the flair text (e.g. :esports: Esports Official) or the flair template ID (e.g. 12ff3a4-66a7ff77-44f4f). Only one is allowed.
separateTabPostFlair1.placeholder: Leave blank to keep all posts in one tab.

postTitle.label: Default Post Title
postTitle.helpText: Title used on all post names (you can make custom one in post create menu action)

postsButtonName.label: Posts Tab Button Name
postsButtonName.helpText: Custom name for the posts tab button

commentsButtonName.label: Comments Tab Button Name
commentsButtonName.helpText: Custom name for the comments tab button

bottomSubtitle.label: Bottom Subtitle
bottomSubtitle.helpText: Custom subtitle text for the bottom of the app. Can be plain text (max 30 chars) or a markdown link [text](url) where text is max 30 chars and url is max 1000 chars. Only *.reddit.com, x.com, or twitter.com domains allowed.

disableComments.label: Disable Comments
disableComments.helpText: Disable viewing comments Button in the App post (i.e. If you only want to pin posts)
